mentionedBy.name: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD)
mentionedBy.notes: Leading semiconductor manufacturer that produces chips for AMD and competitors. While also a manufacturing partner, TSMC competes in foundry business and invests heavily in R&D to stay at the forefront of manufacturing technology.

mentionedBy.name: Intel Corporation
mentionedBy.notes: World's largest semiconductor foundry that has surpassed Intel in manufacturing capabilities. Intel's biggest potential foundry customers have longstanding relationships with TSMC, making competition in the foundry business particularly challenging.

2025.note: Leading semiconductor manufacturer that produces chips for AMD and competitors. While also a manufacturing partner, TSMC competes in foundry business and invests heavily in R&D to stay at the forefront of manufacturing technology.

World's largest semiconductor foundry that has surpassed Intel in manufacturing capabilities. Intel's biggest potential foundry customers have longstanding relationships with TSMC, making competition in the foundry business particularly challenging.
